LanguageData.Hare.label: заєць
LanguageData.Hare.description: This small, solitary herbivore can swiftly hop away from danger.
LanguageData.Hare.tools.head.label: голова
LanguageData.Snowhare.label: заєць білий
LanguageData.Snowhare.description: This hardy animal survives the brutal winters of its homelands by burrowing through snow to find edible plants.
LanguageData.Snowhare.tools.head.label: голова
